titleStmt.title: A boke made by a certayne great clerke, agaynst the newe idole, and olde deuyll whiche of late tyme, in Misnia shulde haue ben canonysed for a saynt.
Wider den neuen Abgott un alten Teufel, der zu Meissen soll erhoben werden English
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprynted by me Robert Wyer dwellynge in saynt Martyns parysshe, besydes charynge Crosse],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Luther, Martin. Wider den neuen Abgott un alten Teufel, der zu Meissen soll erhoben werden.
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Leaf E7v: Thus endeth the worke made agaynst the false canonysacyon of Benno the Bysshope.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
